mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_store (user_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type, category, upload_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{category}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM file_store WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND file_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY upload_time DESC
